snippet.title: SHOCK TROOPERS 2nd SQUAD: Gameplay video
snippet.description:
“SHOCK TROOPERS 2nd SQUAD” is a famous military-themed action shooting title which was released on SNK’s NEOGEO
MVS arcade game system in 1998. Keeping the popular score system introduced in the previous installment, “SHOCK
TROOPERS” returns with a brand new squad of troopers. With the introduction of different maneuverable vehicles and
branching paths, “SHOCK TROOPERS 2nd SQUAD” can be played and replayed in many ways. Furthermore, this perfect
NEOGEO port on Steam includes a high quality multiplayer feature to enjoy “SHOCK TROOPERS 2nd SQUAD” with
brother-in-arms from everywhere.

Steam store page URL:　 http://store.steampowered.com/app/465870
